thread.title: From Bulldozers to Beer, Tariffs Could Ripple Through U.S. Economy

author: Andrew Tangel
title: From Bulldozers to Beer, Tariffs Could Ripple Through U.S. Economy
text:
President Donald Trumpâ€™s plan to impose steep tariffs on steel and aluminum imports drew sharp criticism Thursday from industries that fear it could raise their costs to make everything from airplanes to beer cans.
The bigger worry, some manufacturers and agricultural groups said, is the potential for retaliatory measures by other countries that could imperil U.S. exports and jobs.
